API

Conversion is also possible via post request with an attached .ild file.

curl -F "data=@/path/to/file.ild" http://ildaconverter.sidneydouw.de/convert

let formData = new FormData()

formData.append('data', globals.activeFile)

fetch('/convert', {

method: 'post',

body: formData

})
